name: Grave Robber (SoakGames)
description:
Hi guys!

I finally finished my new game. It's a casual arcade game called Grave Robber. I put a lot of work into it, so I hope you guys will like it. Hopefully it will help you all kill some time and get through the quarantine.

Good luck, Have fun!

It appears a recent fix has brought some issues with it, you should download the newest version of the game to prevent crashes.
